review_text: A beautifully appointed home that felt like home! A great space for entertaining while in town.
Maddie's house was as described and in a great location. The house is clean and well kept. I would definitely stay here again.

Maddie’s listing exceeded all of our expectations. The house was so beautiful and spotless clean. The area was peaceful and felt safe. The rooms and bathrooms were very spacious. We can’t wait to come back!
Our host made the stay an excellent experience!
The Farmhouse on Ollie was fantastic. Maddie’s hospitality is unrivaled and the house is absolutely perfect! Everything you need and more! A+++ stay in Stephenville!
I had a great stay at Maddie's place. It was clean and comfortable. I would recommend it to others.
We had a great time staying at Maddie’s place! It was a very comfortable space with plenty of room, would recommend staying here to anybody!
Very cute home with great bed and even the little extras in the pantry were very thoughtful. The house felt brand new and it was all very clean.

The Farmhouse on Ollie is a lovely home. It is fresh, clean, no clutter, nicely decorated and furnished. The kitchen is perfectly stocked with anything you could possibly need, the towels/bed linens are of good quality. The photos are true to the quality, comfort and design of the house.
We were visiting Stephenville to celebrate my brother and sister-in-law's 50th wedding anniversary. This was a great house for us and our grown children to stay for the weekend. Thank you, Maddie!

We enjoyed our stay, the house was as described and Maddie made everything easy for us. We met our daughter and son-in-law there to visit, its close to half way between were they currently live and where we live and they both graduated from Tarleton so we always enjoy going back to Stephenville.
This house is adorable! Maddie was great to work with- she made our stay very easy! The house was super clean! Check this out for sure!

When we arrived it was even better than I could have imagined! We arrived in December for a Tarleton State graduation. The house was perfectly and tastefully decorated with Christmas decor that did not clutter but added a perfect holiday touch. We were also greeted with several snacks available which were appreciated! The pantry even had some basics like flour and sugar and even some Mac and cheese. This was a pleasant surprise. We had 6 people staying in the house and had a small approved gathering to celebrate the graduation. It was perfect! A true diamond covering all 4 C’s! Comfortable, convenient, clean, and super cute!
We also had a bit of a challenge in that the day of graduation was raining and the school moved graduation to Saturday instead of Friday. We had planned to leave on Saturday. Checkout was at 11 but graduation was not until 3:00. Maddie was awesome and worked with us to extend our time in the house. Top Notch Host!!
Great location. Clean and spacious. Would definitely stay again
Wonderful house with nice furnishings. The host was very friendly and wanted to make sure that we had the best stay possible.
We loved this accommodation!!! It was everything we needed and then some! I hope it’s available every time we go to visit our daughter in Stephenville!!
They guys had an awesome stay!

This house met all of expectations and more. We arrived and the host had some yummy snacks and waters available. It is adorable, but most importantly spotlessly clean. The beds were very comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with everything we could’ve needed.
I would definitely recommend staying here and hope it’s available the next time we come to Stephenville.
Cool old home, very nicely updated.
This place was very unique and it felt like home. bathroom is extraordinary and the outside sitting was very relaxing. nice comfortable beds. definitely recommend
Beautiful place! Highly recommend!
The house was perfect for a weekend getaway. Close to the square and extremely comfortable.

You must stay in this airbnb if you're in the area! It's a carefully appointed historical landmark. It's obvious that a great deal of time and thought went into the furniture and decor, right down to the colorful potted plants out front. The beds are luxurious and the shower is first rate. I wish we could have spent more time on the front porch soaking up the calm. It's very close to the square and not far from the college. Check in was smooth. The host was very helpful and engaging. Absolutely delightful place! We'll be back.
This is a beautiful historic gem that is so worth the money.
The house was absolutely beautiful and peaceful. The town was within walking distance if you didn't want to drive.
We had a great visit. Brad and Mel were fantastic hosts!
Great place to stay and hang out while my son was in a rodeo school! Good Wi-Fi and super clean. Comfortable beds!
We had a great stay. The house was very clean, easy to find, comfortable and close to campus. We will be back for sure!
Place was great! Very close to campus! Would def stay here again!
I would definitely rent this if the need arose again. The home is clean and comfortable. Much better than a hotel. Brad was always responsive, a great host!
Great spot to stay in Stephenville. Clean, organized, easy to find, and cute. Nicely laid out floor plan. Super easy instructions to access home. Clean and spotless. Will stay here again.

I cannot say enough about this place and its great hosts. I stayed in town for work and needed a comfortable stay where I could cook meals. The kitchen was fully stocked with cooking utensils, which made that very easy. The house was so cute and easy to find. Very beautifully decorated, while still having the character of ab older home. A cute bakery within walking distance and very close to the local college. Whatever brings you to town, this is a great space for a small family or a few friends looking for a peaceful weekend away. The host was so generous and very quick to respond. Would stay again!
This was our second stay and we will come again! Very comfortable home with lots of thoughtful amenities. Wifi is strong.

Excellent place, it's like being at home. It has many more details of the ones published.
100% Recommended. Whenever we go to Stephenville we will stay there.
The cutest home ever! Easy check in and check out process. Felt right at home. Also one of the cleanest bnbs i’ve ever stayed in!

Cute little house

Cozy and quiet home!! This home had everything we needed, we will definitely stay again!

A great stay!!! From the moment you walk in you feel at home. Beautifully decorated, comfortable furniture, fast WiFi!! The beds were so comfortable and the master bath had an awesome shower Quiet neighborhood, close to everything,The kitchen had everything you need!!! Extra touches like cream and sugar, bottles of water, and laundry soap available, the box fan was a nice add on for noise

We enjoyed staying in Brad's place - had everything we needed and plenty of space! Easy to find, in a nice part of town. Brad was so very helpful with advice about restaurants and attractions. Great stay perfect location. Really a beautiful house and easy to access!

Nice and spacious place to stay!

My sister and I enjoyed our stay. Everything was very clean and we had everything we needed. It was a comfortable place. The beds had heated pads. I didn't use mine, as I prefer to be cooler, but my sister LOVED that. She fell right to sleep. The house is not too far a drive from shopping and restaurants. Brad and Melody were very nice and communication with them was good. We would stay there again, if we are ever in Stephenville again.
Felt right at home. Loved the bed warmers for the freeze. Plenty of room and great hospitality. This is where I will stay for every visit to Stephenville from now on.
This is our second time staying at this house! Great house and great hosts!
Enjoyed our stay in this cute older home. Perfect for our stay in Stephenville.

It felt like home. All of amenities you would have at home were available.
I would highly recommend this property.

We really enjoyed our stay. Was so nice have Christmas in nice home away from home with our daughter. Brad and Mel was so helpful and kind with any question or issues we needed. Home was great very comfy cozy just as home away from home. Thanks and we would definitely stay again sometime when back in town.

Brads & Mel’s place is amazing! We’ve stayed in a few spots in stephenville & this is by far our fav! close to campus, spacious, clean & was stocked with everything you might need + more! We will definitely be back next time. Thanks!
Brad was an excellent host! The home was as described and very cute. Impeccable attention to detail, we felt right at home and was the perfect location for touring the college.
I needed a last minute place to stay and Brad and Melody were helpful in ensuring we had a clean place to sleep for the evening. It is a beautiful home. Great location. Would stay there again!
Great place and great hosts!
Our family had a fantastic time at Brad's place! We will definitely be back next time we are in town.

My boys and I absolutely loved Brad’s property! It was so cute and cozy. We wished we had stayed longer as it was so nice and homey. We will definitely make this the Airbnb we stay every time we visit Stephenville.

This is my favorite place in stephenville. We’ve stayed at five other places. I hope this one is always available when we come
we loved it.

We had a great time at Brad and Mel's place. The communication was super easy and quick, and the place looks exactly like it does in the pictures. Great place! Brad was very accommodating and responsive.
Really enjoyed our stay and loved the inside of the house. Would loved to stay again!

Lovely home and thoughtfully stocked! Wifi was great and we were able to work comfortably. Great communication and we'd love to return.

This home was the perfect setting for us to visit Stephenville, a place that will always have our heart! It was located on one of the main streets that provides easy access all over town. Super grateful we found this quaint home!

Brad's place was such a nice and comfortable place to stay in Stephenville. It was clean and well stocked with everything you could need. There was water and sports drinks stocked in the fridge. The beds were comfortable with TV in each bedroom. I loved the walk in shower in the main bedroom. Brad's communication and instructions were perfect. The location is very nice for access anywhere. The bakery across the street is a must stop. I highly recommend, the place is lovely and Brad is great. I'll definitely be back.
Great place- close to TSU! Clean and cozy- perfect home to stay in. Thank you for syringe your home with us

Great stay! House was perfect! Host was very responsive!

Everything was clean and comfortable.

My family and I had a great stay! It was a quick trip but would definitely recommend for another stay! Very clean and comfortable! Everything we needed!

My mom and I stayed here for two nights while visiting family in Stephenville. Very clean, comfortable and convenient. Would definitely stay here again and recommend.

We would absolutely recommend The Warmer Place and will definitely consider this for home-away-from-home on future visits to Stephenville.
The house was beautiful and clean! It was exactly what we needed and in a great location. Brad was a great host and communicated super well!
Very nice place! Great location to all restaurants and TSU campus.

Great place! The host was very attentive and gave clear instructions for a seamless process. The home is very spacious and updated. Very comfortable stay, and will definitely check this place out again the next time I’m in the area! Thanks again for such a positive experience! ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️

We loved Brad’s place. It was perfect for our family and was fully stocked with all the essentials and more. We were here for our daughter’s softball games at TSU and would definitely stay here again. It was just a few minutes from the field!

Easy to communicate with. Place was so charming, cozy and welcoming! We had the best time hanging out here. Had everything we needed. Very clean and organized!

Even better than pictured! Extremely clean and beautifully designed. We enjoyed the front porch swing and the close proximity to the bakery. We’d stay here again!
Great spot! Love the charming place.

Great home and location! Exactly as advertised and will definitely be booking this one again!!

Great place to stay!! Very clean and cheerful colors inside. Would definitely stay again!

This listing was a true depiction of this property. It was in a great location for Tarleton State University and very quiet neighborhood. Brad was a great host and made sure that our stay was comfortable. It was a great home and exactly what we needed for our trip to Stephenville.
Our stay was great! Very clean and the hosts were very helpful. I recommend booking with them!

We enjoyed our stay tremendously!

The cutest air bnb I have ever been to. The decor, linens, and all other selections were so comfy/beautiful. My favorite part was the surprise bottle of champagne the host left us for our wedding night. They were extremely thoughtful and I would recommend this stay to anyone!!
We loved Dally's place and cannot wait to go back!
Great location! Super cute and extremely clean!
Loved this lovely home! So warm and comfy and perfect for our weekend get away. Will definitely stay here again the next time we’re in town.
We loved it! So cute and peaceful. Decorated amazing. I walked around barefoot the whole time, my feet never got dirty. Quiet, roomy and so comfortable.
Wonderful place.

An absolute gem of a place, we highly recommend staying here. Nearby amenities, quiet neighborhood, beautiful home. Dally was responsive and helpful. Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay, our girls didn’t want to leave. We stayed here and drove into Glen Rose for the eclipse, and it was well worth the scenic drive! The decor was top notch, the beds were extremely comfortable and plush, there’s a tv in every room, extremely clean bathrooms, and that kitchen! Stunning. And the view of that wide open sky in the backyard is simply amazing. It’s especially perfect for a quiet couple’s getaway.
One thing I would like to point out is that there is a lot of glass around the home (showers, large floor mirrors, furnishings, and dish ware) so be mindful if you have littles.
Overall, 5/5! We hope to stay there again.

We have family in the area and have never had much luck with local hotels! We are so thankful we found the Charlotte House! The house is so so clean and decorated phenomenally. This will be our go to spot when we’re in town!!
This is a great Airbnb. Did not have any issues with our stay. The location is beautiful with great views.

This was a lovely house and very comfortable. Very quiet neighborhood that we enjoyed.
